newsitem.title: USA: Stanley Works CFO Richard Huck to retire.
newsitem.headline: Stanley Works CFO Richard Huck to retire.

text.p: The Stanley Works on Wednesday said Chief Financial Officer Richard Huck will retire June 1.
Theresa Yerkes, vice president and controller, will function as CFO until a successor to Huck is identified, the company said.
The Stanley Works produces tools, hardware and specialty hardware for consumer, home improvement, industrial and professional use.
